price: 6. Loba: Akitisa yango oyo ayebi sekele ya likolo na mabele. Ya soló, ye azali molimbisi atonda mawa.
arabic: قُلۡ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِي يَعۡلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul anzalahu alladhī yaʿlamu al-sira fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi innahu kāna ghafūran raḥīman
